Title: Crack the Whip
Writer: Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story by), Ben Levin (story by), Rebecca Sugar (story by), Ian Jones-Quartey (story by), Kat Morris (story by), Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)
Actors: Zach Callison, Kimberly Brooks, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: Amethyst looks after Steven and Connie while Pearl and Garnet look for Jasper's whereabouts.
